data.title: Omnisphere 2 Jam With Originally Sampled Hang Drum
data.meta_description: This jam definitely has some history. Watch the founder of Spectrasonics, Eric Persing, jam with the originally sampled Hang performer Gulli Briem. What makes this performance unique is that the Omnisphere 2 patch that Persing...
data.text:
This jam definitely has some history. Watch the founder of Spectrasonics, Eric Persing, jam with the originally sampled Hang performer Gulli Briem. What makes this performance unique is that the Omnisphere 2 patch that Persing plays was sampled directly from the real hang drum that Briem is playing.

Aside from the obvious, this jam just sounds cool. Watching these passionate musicians improvise and explore different percussive textures was a treat to watch. If you are unfamiliar with Omnisphere 2, watch a demo of it here.
